name: pix
description: Plateforme d'évaluation et de certification des compétences numériques
author: GIP Pix

scripts.build:admin: (cd admin && npm run build) && mkdir -p dist && cp -R admin/dist dist/admin
scripts.build:certif: (cd certif && npm run build) && mkdir -p dist && cp -R certif/dist dist/certif
scripts.build:front: run-p --print-label --max-parallel 2 build:mon-pix build:orga build:certif build:admin build:junior
scripts.build:mon-pix: (cd mon-pix && npm run build) && mkdir -p dist && cp -R mon-pix/dist dist/app
scripts.build:orga: (cd orga && npm run build) && mkdir -p dist && cp -R orga/dist dist/orga
scripts.build:junior: (cd junior && npm run build) && mkdir -p dist && cp -R junior/dist dist/junior
scripts.ci:front: run-p --print-label ci:mon-pix ci:orga ci:certif ci:admin ci:junior
scripts.clean: run-p --print-label clean:api clean:audit-logger clean:mon-pix clean:orga clean:certif clean:admin clean:junior && npm run clean:root
scripts.start: run-p --print-label start:api start:mon-pix start:orga start:junior start:certif start:admin
scripts.test:api: cd api && npm run lint && npm test
scripts.domains:trust-self-signed-certificate:ma: cd ./scripts/local-domains/ && docker compose cp caddy:/data/caddy/pki/authorities/local/root.crt /tmp/root.crt && sudo security add-trusted-cert -d -r trustRoot -k /Library/Keychains/System.keychain /tmp/root.crt
scripts.domains:trust-self-signed-certificate:li: cd ./scripts/local-domains/ && sudo docker cp caddy:/data/caddy/pki/authorities/local/root.crt /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/root.crt && sudo update-ca-certificates --fresh
